title: Designing Self-Efficacy Strategies in University Learning and Educational Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of university education systems and learning theories
context.additional_context: Training for in-service professionals including digital device utilization and project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically explain the theoretical foundations of self-efficacy and its role in higher education
Learners can evaluate the impact of self-efficacy on learning outcomes by applying literature analysis methods
Learners can apply educational strategies for enhancing self-efficacy (experience design, feedback systems, digital competency development) to actual educational contexts
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
